meaningMnemonic: A <radical>child</radical> will ask if they want <radical>two</radical> <radical>water</radical>s because they need a grown-up's <kanji>consent</kanji>. Children aren't allowed to have whatever they want, they need to make sure it's okay and get consent first.
readingMnemonic: "Of course my child, you have my <kanji>consent</kanji>," comes the voice of the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). The Shougun is very pleased by this child, because he expects everyone to ask for consent around him.
